name: Dungeon Run (WIP)
description:
Game submitted for MigJam #7

Things planned and left unfinished:

* Enemy spiders, combat

* Menus, UI

* Sounds/music

* macOS, Linux builds

* Complete level

Goal: 

Survive the dungeon run.

Everything is random and based on your luckl meter!

Watch the health!

Controls:

AWSD - Move

Shift - Run

Mouse - look around

Left click -interact

Assets:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets?q=isometric

https://opengameart.org/content/isometric-parts-2
